synopsis.text:
Cherry-chan, Soda-kun, and a host of other adorable, palm-sized seals called Mamegoma join the Mamekawa family's newest addition, Mameta, in a heartwarming tale of friendship and growth. Akane, a young girl living next to the beach with her loving family, discovers Mameta washed up on the shore and takes the tiny creature to a local shop called Mamegoma Island. After nursing Mameta back to health, Akane adopts the little seal and begins learning how to care for it with the help of her family.

As Akane and her energetic younger sister Yui navigate daily life in their family's tofu shop, Mameta forms bonds with other Mamegoma, including the charming Cherry-chan and the spirited Soda-kun. Alongside these newfound friendships, the Mamekawa family's resident duck, Takayaso, adds to the delightful chaos. Join Akane and Mameta as they embark on a series of wholesome adventures, discovering the joys and challenges of raising a Mamegoma in this endearing tale that is sure to capture your heart.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
